summary: A test suite that validates the integration of Low‑Rank Adaptation (LoRA) modules with the CogVideoX model, covering inference with various LoRA configurations, padding adjustments, NaN handling, scaling options, denoiser behavior, and persistence through save/load.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of LoRA‑enhanced CogVideoX deployments, enabling reliable video generation with adaptable model components for production and research use.
